segments.text: Good morning . Is this where I can get a library card issued to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , we have a short form right here ; just hand it to me when you are done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That looks great , but I will also need your driver's license or other form of I . D .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , this looks nice . Do you know how to use it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am pretty sure how to use it , but can you remind me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , just remember that all of the needed information is on the card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I hope you have a wonderful time on your library visits !
segments.speaker: S2
